Query.Sentence: with slf as ( select * from sub_lapse sli where sub_lapse_start <= current_date and sub_lapse_end >= current_date ), shared_subs as ( select s.subs_id , count(*) shared_count from user_sub us inner join "subscription" s on us.subs_id = s.subs_id group by s.subs_id ) select #COLUMNS#, (slf.sub_lapse_price / shared_subs.shared_count) shared_price from slf inner join shared_subs on shared_subs.subs_id = slf.subs_id inner join subscription s on slf.subs_id = s.subs_id inner join plan_price pp on s.plan_price_id = pp.plan_price_id inner join plan p on p.plan_id = pp.plan_id inner join platform platf on p.platf_id = platf.platf_id inner join frequency f on f.fr_id = p.fr_id inner join user_sub us on us.subs_id=s.subs_id #WHERE#;

with last_s as( select subs_id, max(sub_lapse_id) max_id from sub_lapse s group by subs_id ) select #COLUMNS# from last_s inner join sub_lapse sl on last_s.max_id = sl.sub_lapse_id inner join subscription s on last_s.subs_id = s.subs_id inner join plan_price pp on pp.plan_price_id = s.plan_price_id inner join plan p on p.plan_id = pp.plan_id inner join user_sub us on us.subs_id=s.subs_id where sl.sub_lapse_end <= current_date and s.subs_autorenewal = true;

with shared_subs as ( select s.subs_id , count(*) shared_count from user_sub us inner join "subscription" s on us.subs_id = s.subs_id group by s.subs_id ) select #COLUMNS#, (sl.sub_lapse_price / shared_subs.shared_count) as shared_price from shared_subs inner join subscription s on shared_subs.subs_id = s.subs_id inner join sub_lapse sl on sl.subs_id = s.subs_id inner join plan_price pp on s.plan_price_id = pp.plan_price_id inner join plan p on p.plan_id = pp.plan_id inner join frequency f on f.fr_id = p.fr_id inner join platform p2 on p2.platf_id = p.platf_id inner join category c on c.cat_id = p2.cat_id inner join user_sub us on us.subs_id=s.subs_id #WHERE#;

with slf as ( select * from sub_lapse sli where sub_lapse_start <= current_date and sub_lapse_end >= current_date and (sli.sub_lapse_end::date - current_date::date)>= 0 and (sli.sub_lapse_end::date - current_date::date)<= 30 )
select #COLUMNS# from slf inner join subscription s on slf.subs_id = s.subs_id inner join plan_price pp on s.plan_price_id = pp.plan_price_id inner join plan p on p.plan_id = pp.plan_id inner join platform platf on p.platf_id = platf.platf_id inner join frequency f on f.fr_id = p.fr_id inner join user_sub us on us.subs_id=s.subs_id #WHERE#
